name: CUBEZ (itch) (Janos Domboroczki)
description:
Note: Game just broke before the deadline, so the game can not be completed, unfortunately...
Enemies not taking damage :(
Movement: WASD

2 players allowed(listen server), can be played over the network by sharing public or local IP address and copying it to the Host IP textbox.

The goal of the game is to destroy all the Evil yellow cubes, by trapping  and shooting them.

One of you drops blocks by going into the grid, and the other player can shoot.

The blocks that you dropped connect up as you move around, as long as they are not broken by the Evil cubes. 

If you drop the first and the last one near the end of the grid, they connect up and become undestroyable.

If you trap a cube in a small area, it will start bouncing around and it's shield will be disabled. At this time the other player can take it out.

Be careful, they can escape!

Once you killed 'em all, you won!
